    • Uses of Point in tracer

      Subclasses of Point in tracer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Tracer<T extends Path>
      A Point that moves along a Path at some rate of speed, possibly speeding up and slowing down according to the curve specified by an Easing.

      Interpolates between the line defined by (a.x, a.y) and (b.x, b.y) by the given amount (a value between 0 and 1) and stores the result in the given point.
